TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Liwkiw_a_kamu, title = Liwkiw_a_kamu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Liwkiw_a_kamu} }

S.FORM: Liwkiw a tademaw u kamu(Liwkiw a kamu:ルーチューグチ) nuheni nai' ku sakalecada a nakamuan, pasu Yemin a kamu, Ukinawa a kamu, aydaay a Kuyzen a kamu, Pacun-san a kamu, Kunku a kamu, atu Nakuo a kamu. . pulung han u Liwkiw a kumu han, milecad tunu Dipun a kamuan. . Liwkiw a kamuan cinglaw henay, situngusa a misulitay san u Aetay a kamuan, patucek tu Dipun a kamuan ku sapipulung, nika mikinkiway tu kamuan a tademaw idaw ku sasakamuen nuheni, saan Liwkiw a kamu atu Nandaw a kamu misengi sa. . Liwkiw yadah ku kenih nu kamu nuheni, u Ukinawa ku tatelungan nu malucekay a kamuan, nakamuan nuheni caay kalecad, tabaki ku caaya kaw masasulaliday a nakamuan. i Liwkiway a tademaw anu mapulung kuheni nu Dipun ku kamu nuheni, u Ukinawaay a tademaw katuu'd ku pahacengay nu ngalngal musakamu tu nu Dipun a nakamuan. ayda pinaa malebut ku misakamuay tunu Liwkiw a kamuan, u babalaki ku musakamuay, sisa Liwkiw a kamuan hamaw satu a malawpes, musakamuay tu Pacungsan a kamuan atu Nakuo a nakamuan, micidek tu samalawpes sa.

Liwkiw a tademaw o kamo(Liwkiw a kamo:ルーチューグチ) noheni nai' ko sakalecada a nakamoan, paso Yemin a kamo, Ukinawa a kamo, aydaay a Koyzen a kamo, Pacon-san a kamo, Konko a kamo, ato Nakoo a kamo. . polong han o Liwkiw a komo han, milecad tono Dipon a kamoan. . Liwkiw a kamoan cinglaw henay, sitongosa a misolitay san o Aetay a kamoan, patocek to Dipon a kamoan ko sapipolong, nika mikinkiway to kamoan a tademaw idaw ko sasakamoen noheni, saan Liwkiw a kamo ato Nandaw a kamo misengi sa. . Liwkiw yadah ko kenih no kamo noheni, o Ukinawa ko tatelongan no malocekay a kamoan, nakamoan noheni caay kalecad, tabaki ko caaya kaw masasolaliday a nakamoan. i Liwkiway a tademaw ano mapolong koheni no Dipon ko kamo noheni, o Ukinawaay a tademaw katoo'd ko pahacengay no ngalngal mosakamo to no Dipon a nakamoan. ayda pinaa malebot ko misakamoay tono Liwkiw a kamoan, o babalaki ko mosakamoay, sisa Liwkiw a kamoan hamaw sato a malawpes, mosakamoay to Pacongsan a kamoan ato Nakoo a nakamoan, micidek to samalawpes sa.
